summary: CI documentation job fails when run from repository forks because it requires a secret token that isn't available in fork environments. The job should be skipped when the token secret is not found.
userImpact: Contributors and maintainers cannot run CI successfully from forked repositories, blocking pull request validation.
rootCause: The docs job in CI workflow requires a secret token that is not available in fork environments, causing the job to fail instead of being skipped.
proposedFix: Modify the CI workflow to skip the docs job when the required token secret is not found.
resolutionDetails: The CI workflow was updated to skip the docs job when the token secret is unavailable.
keyQuote: Docs job should be skipped if no token secret is found.
